newsitem.title: USA: IMM currency futures drift at higher levels.
newsitem.headline: IMM currency futures drift at higher levels.

text.p: May 8 - IMM currency futures drifted at higher levels in calm midday trade after brisk earlier turnover slowed. Brokers said they saw little mark response when George Soros said he was 75 pct sure EMU would start on time. Futures had popped up near Europe's close largely on technicals in cross-dominated trade. June marks stalled near resistance at $0.5881, or 1.7050 spot.
